frame.name: Project
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen>, which may be an individual or group, is engaged in a complex <fen>Activity</fen>. A larger <fen>Goal</fen> which motivates the <fen>Agent</fen> carrying out the <fen>Activity</fen> may be indicated. Instead of a particular <fen>Activity</fen>, a <fen>Field</fen> of endeavor may be indicated. The project may also have a <fen>Name</fen> and the <fen>Time</fen> when as well as the <fen>Place</fen> where it is ongoing may be specified.
<ex>The <fex name="act">New Car Assessment</fex> <t>Program</t> (NCAP) is dedicated to helping the public buy a safer car.</ex>
<ex>The school will continue with <fex name="age">its</fex> <t>project</t> <fex name="goa">to end all violence related to racism, xenophobia and intolerance</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual or organization that carries out the project.
<ex>The <fex name="age">DOE</fex> Human Genome <t>Program</t> also has developed high-throughput approaches to identifying is-regulatory sequences in the human and other genomes</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Field
FE.definition:
<def-root>An area of human endeavor, typically scientifc in nature, in which the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Activity</fen> falls.
<ex>Several <t>projects</t> <fex name="fie">in computational linguistics</fex> have recently stalled due to lack of funding .</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition:
<def-root>What the <fen>Agent</fen> (an individual or the members of an organization) are dedicated to doing.
<ex>The <fex name="act">New Car Assessment</fex> <t>Program</t> (NCAP) is dedicated to helping the public buy a safer car. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>A name given to the project for identification.
<ex>Our agency is responsible for administering the <fex name="nam">WIC</fex> <t>Program</t></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition:
<def-root>The larger aim that the <fen>Agent</fen> is pursuing by carrying out certain coordinated measures.
<ex>The <t>program</t> <fex name="goa">to analyze the composition of Titan's sludge</fex> is nearly complete.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Salient_entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>An entity (abstract or concrete) which is involved in an implicit <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>Iran has vowed to continue its <fex name="sal">nuclear</fex> <t>program</t> and is demanding that sanctions against it should be lifted .</ex> <ex>The DOE <fex name="sal">Human Genome</fex> <t>Program</t> also has developed high-throughput approaches to identify cis-regulatory sequences in the human and other genomes, based on shared </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the manner in which the <fen>Agent</fen> performs the <fen>Activity</fen> associated with the program.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The length of time over which the project is lasts or is slated to last.
<ex>The government has initiated yet another <fex name="dur">seven-year</fex> <t>program</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Co-participant
FE.definition:
<def-root> <fen>Co-participant</fen> is an entity that participates in a coordinated way in the <fen>Activity</fen> of the project as the <fen>Agent</fen>.
<ex>It turned out that the company was doing a <t>program</t> <fex name="Co-participant">with a local Arab-American communal group</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Project
FE.definition: <def-root>The ongoing plan of action which allows the <fen>Agent</fen> to pursue the <fen>Activity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Project</fen> is ongoing.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is used to describe a characteristic of the <fen>Project</fen>. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: project.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an enterprise carefully planned to achieve a particular aim.

lexUnit.name: program.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: set of related measures or activities with a long-term aim.

lexUnit.name: plan.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a detailed proposal for doing or achieving something.

lexUnit.name: scheme.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a systematic plan or arrangement for attaining some particular object or putting a particular idea into effect.
